Hand wash and machine wash, please do not bleach.If you like Jujutsu anime Kaisen, you will definitely like it!Men Pant Size:Small: waist 26.5 - 36 inches, length 38 inchesMedium: waist 28 - 37 inches, length 39 inchesLarge: waist 30 - 39 inches, length 40 inchesX-Large: waist 31.5 - 40.5 inches, length 41 inchesXX-Large: waist 33 - 42 inches, length 41 inchesJujutsu anime kaisen is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Gege Akutami, serialized in Shueisha's Weekly Shōnen Jump since March 2018. The individual chapters of Jujutsu Kaisen are collected and published by Shueisha, with fifteen tankōbon volumes released as of March 2021. The story follows high school student Yuji Itadori as he joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers in order to kill a powerful Curse named Ryomen Sukuna, of whom Yuji becomes the host. The series is a sequel to a four-chapter monthly series called Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical School, which was published in Shueisha's Jump GIGA from April to July 2017, and was later released under the title Jujutsu anime Kaisen 0 in December 2018.
